phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
Asta and Yami face off with the leader of the Eye of the Midnight Sun, Licht,
and end up in a life or death situation.
Light Magic: Ray of Divine Punishment.
But at that moment, Finral and Gauche arrived!
Gauche used a miraculous spell, and Licht's own spell was reflected right back at him.
No matter how big it is...
they were finally able to defeat the leader of the Eye of the Midnight Sun, Licht.
I could not see it, but...
It is the speed of light.
There is no way he could have dodged all of it.
Way to steal all the glory, jerk!
I am only here because you picked me up that one day, Captain.
So I guess it is basically my glory.
Captain Yami, you did not even do anything!
Do not get cocky just because you beat the scrawny dude, kid.
Captain Yami, Gauche, Asta, we all worked hard.
None of this would have happened without my spatial magic!
Hurry up and get me back to Marie.
Again, I have seniority over you!
I bet you will hug me and tell me how great I am.
And I told you I could only use my magic one more time.
I have to recover my magic first.
Did you really just do that?!
Looks like his own ultimate spell did a number on him, too.
Guess he had another archenemy besides me.
Sorry I beat the crap out of him.
Of course I do not know this bastard.
Yeah, I do not get it at all,
but we are going to take you back to Magic Knights Headquarters.
You will spill everything there is to know about the Eye of the Midnight Sun there.
Now that Hot-Blooded King of Hardnoses has been avenged.
But he is not dead yet!
Oh, quit sweatin' the minor details.
Let us see, Dark Binding Magic...
Hey, when are those reinforcements getting here?
Black Bulls girl, I already contacted your captain quite a while ago.
And what a bah-hassle it was.
He would not listen to a word I said.
He should have left a while bah-hack.
Guess I will head home and go to bed.
I wonder if my captain's awake yet.
Guess I should report this to him.
Why did not you report this to me?
Do you want to get sliced in half?
Yeah, I definitely do not want that.
The Magic Knights came to save us!
Y-Yes, we just fulfilled our duty as Magic Knights.
I mean, all I did was contact them, but...
But why did he go straight over there without stopping here first?
Sister Theresa also used these amazing spells and saved us!
There was a really scary man.
Say, what happened to the Magic Knights?
Sister Theresa... A-Are you all right?
I have still got at least a hundred years to go.
Thank you so much for saving these kids!
Sister, please do not talk any more.
He said I would not be scared if I wore it.
I did not cry at all!
He is still in the cave.
The leader of the Eye of the Midnight Sun.
Along with some captain named Yami and...
My brother went to help them, along with someone who uses spatial magic.
I am sure everything will be okay!
I am sure they will come back victorious.
should have taken me with them if they came all the way back to town.
It is not that I am worried about Asta!
It is because I am one of the Magic Knights!
I used a lot of magic.
It is not going to recover that quickly.
Do not let it bother you.
I did not get any extra magic, unlike you!
The longer we wait, the happier she might be to see me.
I guess I would not mind that, either.
I am not telling you a single thing about Marie!
Anyone who gets close to Marie is my enemy!
Cannot you at least bring me some breakfast with your spatial magic?
I am not a delivery service.
Who the heck are those guys?
Well, this definitely does not look good.
Looks like Licht and Val are in a bit of trouble.
I am usually pretty lazy, but...
I got to save my friends.
Hey, that is a unique design.
He can move at light speed, too!
Dark Magic: Dark Cloaked Lightless Slash!
But this should be easy to fix, so whatever.
It is the same as Round Eyebrows's!
My strength alone was not enough.
Fana, now that you are here...
I have nothing to worry about, now that you are here.
Who do you think you are?
It is a pain in the butt if you try to shoulder everything yourself.
How dare you insects do that to my comrades?
I will stomp you like ants and rip you apart, like I am ripping the wings off a butterfly!
I hate those who have hurt Licht.
They are the strongest three in the Eye of the Midnight Sun.
They are more powerful than you?
He has to be bluffing when he says they are stronger than him.
It is too much trouble to bluff.
Just as the name suggests, your kingdom takes the clover as its symbol.
Within the clover's leaves are pleasant words that do not suit you.
I have given them names that mean the opposite of those.
With a name meaning the opposite of faith, Raia the Disloyal.
With a name meaning the opposite of hope, Vetto the Despair.
And with a name meaning the opposite of love, Fana the Hateful.
I will kill those who have hurt Licht.
Those names sound grand and all,
but your names are not enough to tell us how strong you are.
Well, I guess we will just have to prove it to you,
even though it is a pain in the butt.
Copy Magic: Dark Cloaked Lightless Slash.
Do not go ripping off people's magic!
I am going to sue you for copyright infringement!
My magic has not recovered yet.
Let me see the despair in your faces, little mice.
This katana was custom-made and crazy expensive!
I have not even finished paying this thing off.
Nobody likes hysterical chicks, you know.
Looks like it is not fully developed yet, but...
The fire spirit, one of the four great attributes?
I will return Licht's pain hundreds of times over.
Well, are not you working hard?
I wonder how long you can keep it up, though.
Because we are here, Yami is...
But I have not recovered enough to use my spatial magic.
They are on a completely different level!
I told you to stay put!
No, a million years too early for that!
Watch me surpass my limits, right here and now!
As expected, you will not go down easily.
But you are wasting your time.
Each of them is stronger than a Magic Knight Captain.
I think it is about time we end this.
Looks like you are having fun, Yami.
Stronger than a Magic Knight Captain?
Why do not we test out that theory?
Another second or two, and something would have awakened in me.
What are you going to do about this, you lousy so-called friends?
I am amazed you can even say those words when you look like that.
I am going to execute you myself someday, so be ready and wait, foreigner.
Honestly, how pathetic are you that you actually have to rely on us?
Man, harsh as always, I see.
You need to show more interest if you are a Magic Knight!
I am surprised you even know my name, then.
Captain of the Green Praying Mantises Jack the Ripper
The captain of the Green Praying Mantises, Jack the Ripper, who uses severing magic.
He is super sadistic, has a destruction fetish,
and likes to brag whenever he cuts anything and everything.
Apparently he cut down a mountain after a squabble with Yami.
Captain of the Silver Eagles Nozel Silva
The warhorse, the royal captain of the Silver Eagles, Nozel Silva.
Just look at his sparkly aura.
Captain of the Blue Rose Knights Charlotte Roselei
The captain of the Blue Rose Knights, the cool and beautiful Charlotte Roselei!
You are excited all of a sudden?!
I want to get closer to her!
It does not matter how many people... no, vermin show up.
They are no match for us.
I will kill those who harm Licht...
Now, then, let us get things started.
I will chop you all up.
The Eye of the Midnight Sun...
We have plenty of questions for you.
Spring is nice and warm, and I can sleep well.
Sleeping on the beach in summer is the best.
Autumn is for food, autumn is for art...
He is just sleeping all year round.
I have trouble falling asleep, so I hate everyone who can sleep so easily.
Just wish these voices would shut up...
But I am slightly awake now.
Three Magic Knight Captains showed up, after all.
Black Clover, Page 37: The One With No Magic.
Page 37 The One With No Magic
I get to fight the prickly lady.
